channel.title: [DELTA] Climb Stairs

item.title: [DELTA] Climb Stairs
item.dc:creator: @youridudock youridudock
item.description:
@youridudock wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:6, topic:380064”]@All: Everyone here except Spades is a complete idiot. Why would you just make the ladder at height level 1, thats ugly. You should add a method that shows the emote and make it so the timing is right too. Very simple.

@OP: I would tell you how to do this, but all you would do is write a half-assed tutorial on it, say you made it and give me 60% Credits. Karma is a bitch.

Protip: the “==” Identifier CHECKS The Variable, and the identifier “=” sets the variable

Example:

if(poop == true) { heightLevel = 2; }[/quote]

Cool. but he asked why his code wont work and if someone can fix it. he didnt asked for a emote and timer.

Read full topic

item.title: [DELTA] Climb Stairs
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Bad example, you should have used an integer not a boolean

Read full topic

item.title: [DELTA] Climb Stairs
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

@All: Everyone here except Spades is a complete idiot. Why would you just make the ladder at height level 1, thats ugly. You should add a method that shows the emote and make it so the timing is right too. Very simple.

@OP: I would tell you how to do this, but all you would do is write a half-assed tutorial on it, say you made it and give me 60% Credits. Karma is a bitch.

Protip: the “==” Identifier CHECKS The Variable, and the identifier “=” sets the variable

Example:

if(poop == true) { heightLevel = 2; }

Read full topic

item.title: [DELTA] Climb Stairs
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

[quote=“Control Pride, post:1, topic:380064”]Okay guys, how do I make it where if I click on a stair case it make’s my hight += 1;? where would I add this? what would be the code?
I tried to add this to Client class and I got 1 error:

iif(objectID == 4493){ height += 1; }
Compiler:

client.java:15156: cannot find symbol symbol : variable height location: class client height += 1; ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .Sooooo, how would I do this?[/quote]

heightLevel = 1;

Read full topic

item.title: [DELTA] Climb Stairs
item.dc:creator: @youridudock youridudock
item.description:
@youridudock wrote:

Spades:

I wouldn’t do it that way. I would think if someone spam clicked the stairs/ladder it would raise their height level more then just 1. Plus not every stair/ladder takes you the same coord + 1 heighlevel.

Then you just do “heightLevel = 1;” (or was it “heightLevel == 1;” )

Read full topic

item.title: [DELTA] Climb Stairs
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

I wouldn’t do it that way. I would think if someone spam clicked the stairs/ladder it would raise their height level more then just 1. Plus not every stair/ladder takes you the same coord + 1 heighlevel.

item.title: [DELTA] Climb Stairs
item.dc:creator: @youridudock youridudock
item.description:
@youridudock wrote:

[quote=“Control Pride, post:1, topic:380064”]Okay guys, how do I make it where if I click on a stair case it make’s my hight += 1;? where would I add this? what would be the code?
I tried to add this to Client class and I got 1 error:

iif(objectID == 4493){ height += 1; }
Compiler:

client.java:15156: cannot find symbol symbol : variable height location: class client height += 1; ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .Sooooo, how would I do this?[/quote]

I think you should replace the “height +=1;” with “heightLevel += 1;”

Tell me if it works!

Read full topic
